Package index

All functions

analysis_search()
Retrieve Analyses from UNIFI API
arcMS arcMS-package
UNIFI MS converter to Parquet and HDF5 formats
collect_one_sample_data()
Collect data from one sample
connection_apihosturl(<connection_params>) connection_token(<connection_params>)
Class containing UNIFI API connection parameters
convert_all_samples_data()
Convert data from all samples in an Analysis
convert_bin_to_ccs()
Convert bin value to CCS (Collision Cross Section) value
convert_one_sample_data()
Convert one sample
create_connection_params()
Create connection parameters
create_sample_dataset()
Create a sample dataset from a Parquet file created by arcMS
folders_search()
Retrieve Folders from UNIFI API
get_connection_params()
Retrieve the connection parameters object
get_sample_infos()
Retrieve Sample Information from UNIFI API with a sample id
get_samples_list()
Retrieve the list of Samples Results from an Analysis in UNIFI API
get_unifi_api_token()
Retrieve the API token in the environment variable
run_app()
Run Shiny application to use the conversion package
get_sample_data(<sample_dataset>)
Class containing a sample data and metadata
get_sample_metadata(<sample_infos>) get_sample_name(<sample_infos>) get_sample_id(<sample_infos>) get_analysis_name(<sample_infos>) get_sample_metadata_json(<sample_infos>) get_spectrum_metadata(<sample_infos>) get_spectrum_metadata_json(<sample_infos>) add_sample_id(<sample_infos>)
Class containing a sample's information
save_one_sample_data()
Save collected data from one sample
store_unifi_api_token()
Save the API token in the .Renviron file for repeated use
